titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2143) to prevent the use of certain bank instruments for unlawful Internet gambling, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-145, by Mr. Linder.
After general debate, the bill shall be considered for

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 59.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 263.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 196 (Roll no. 252).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 259 - 158 (Roll no. 253).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/10/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced on June 9, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2143 (unlawful Internet gambling funding prohibition).
